text: X. Aruputharaj (26) of Nagercoil was run over by a Tamil Nadu State Transport Corporation bus near Aavin dairy on the Trivandrum National Highway on Saturday. Arputharaj was proceeding to Sivakasi along with his friend Sankar (26) of Weavers Colony on a motorcycle. Police said that Arputharaj tried to overtake the town bus, which was proceeding to Nagercoil from Arumanai Kurusadi. The door near the driver side opened suddenly and hit him and he was caught under the wheels and died on the spot. Sankar escaped with injuries. The body was shifted to Kanyakumari Government Medical College Hospital for post mortem. Nagercoil traffic investigation wing registered a case and are investigating.
title: Youth run over by bus
